Amount (g/ton): (2) It is used in feed for growing cattle at 35 to 70 milligrams per head per day as follows:(i) To aid in stimulating growth and improving feed efficiency.(ii) For increased rate of weight gain and improved feed efficiency; see sponsor 054771.
